item.title: Minneapolis mayor who told ICE to 'get the f--- out' now calls for peace after another shooting incident

item.title: DHS slams Dems for complaining about immigration law: 'It is quite literally their job to change it'
item.description: Democrats call for Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem's impeachment following fatal ICE-involved shooting, while DHS defends enforcement actions.

item.title: White House slams Walz, Democrats in Minnesota following governor's 'direct appeal' to Trump
item.description: President Donald Trump threatened Insurrection Act after Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz calls for "turning temperature down" amid anti-ICE demonstrations.

item.title: Children are at risk of forming romantic bonds with AI chatbots, experts warn
item.description: Congress hears alarming testimony about AI chatbots harming children's mental health, with experts warning of serious emotional risks and dangers.
